projects.title: ssai Self-Driving Car Simulator & Neural Network Visualizer - No Libraries Required
projects.description: Embark on an immersive gaming experience with NeuroDrive, where you code neural networks to navigate virtual roads, witnessing real-time learning as your AI drives, offering insights into its decision-making process, all while venturing into the future of transportation gaming.

projects.title: MoodsWall.com
projects.description: Unlike Meta, MoodsWall.com created by Qia Lin provides a dedicated, open platform for WebApp users to freely share their mood without targeting specific interest groups, offering a refreshing departure from restrictive circle-specific pages.

projects.title: MyJobSearch Android Mobile App
projects.description: One-Click Job Search Android App Mobile Application built with Restful API and Java.

projects.title: AI Prediction in Sentiment of Movie Comments - NLP
projects.description: Enter your movie reviews and Ai will predict either positive or negative reveiws of movie comments with accraucy of 87%+ prediction rate using bayesian classifier - a Natural Language Processing techinque

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: A simple web game for the Snake Game App using HTML5.

projects.title: MERN Memories
projects.description: Built with  React, Node.js, Express & MongoDB to build a Full Stack MERN Application - from start to finish. The App is called Memories and it is a simple social media app that allows users to post interesting events that happened in their lives.

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.description: Utilized Stripe for card transactions. On top of that, this is a unique webshop app for e-commerce applications are impressive.

projects.title: WebRTC App
projects.description: Deployed a React Video Chat Application using WebRTC.

timeLineData.text: Started my journey as PSU CS undergrad student
Presented Ai project in Final NDL Summit leading a team in Nittany Data Lab @ PSU
Pursued Master Degree in CS @ Northeastern Unviersity
Shared my projects with the world
Worked as an SWE intern in Eskuad Inc. - a rewarded Google for Starup company
Generated MoodsWall.com for global users to share their moods online
